description.en:
Ha Jae, who’s contemplating death on the rooftop due to bullying. A senior appears before him and suddenly pushes Ha-Jae off?! But, he wakes up safely in the Nurse’s Office in school. Ha-Jae’s retaliation against the bullying that the delinquents have started again ends in failure…

But, Siwoon appears before him yet again and coaches Ha-Jae to defeat the delinquents in one strike using his fist.

The presence of the Murim appears hidden under what seems to be an ordinary school, and the perilous adventure to the world of Murim begins.

title.en: Yamiochi Yuusha no Haishin Haishin~Tsuihousare, Kakushi Boss Beya ni Hourikomareta Kekka, Boss to Tansakushagari Haishin wo Hajimeru~@comic

altTitles.ja: 闇堕ち勇者の背信配信~追放され、隠しボス部屋に放り込まれた結果、ボスと探索者狩り配信を始める~@comic

altTitles.vi: Livestream Sa Ngã của Vị Anh Hùng Bị Ruồng Bỏ~Bị Trục Xuất và Ném Vào Căn Phòng Ẩn, Tôi Bắt Đầu Stream Săn Thám Hiểm Giả Cùng Boss~@comic

altTitles.en: Stream of a Betrayed Fallen Hero ~ As a result of being exiled and thrown into a hidden boss room, he starts broadcasting hunting bosses and explorers ~ @comic

description.en:
Fifty years have passed since dungeons first appeared on Earth. Dungeon exploration and live streaming are considered the norm for the people.

Kuga, who became a dungeon explorer alongside his close friends, ends up being banished from his party due to him being a supposed "jack of all trades, master of none" hero.

Amidst his despair, Kuga finds himself thrown into the hidden boss room, famous for making explorers unable to step foot into a dungeon ever again. There, he encounters a beautiful female vampire named Alicia.

Though he’s prepared to meet his end, Alicia, captivated by the so-called streaming, has other plans and asks him, "Could you teach me how to stream?"

With nowhere else to go, Kuga reluctantly accepts her proposal and thus begins their unprecedented dungeon explorer-hunting streams.

For some reason, their stream quickly went viral like crazy, and Kuga then began to awaken some unknown powers...?

And meanwhile, something strange is happening to the party members who banished Kuga...
description.vi:
Đã năm mươi năm trôi qua kể từ khi các hầm ngục xuất hiện trên Trái Đất. Khám phá hầm ngục và phát sóng trực tiếp đã trở thành một thói quen đối với mọi người.

Kuga, người đã trở thành thám hiểm gia hầm ngục cùng những người bạn thân, cuối cùng lại bị trục xuất khỏi nhóm vì bị coi là một anh hùng "đa năng nhưng không tinh thông". Trong cơn tuyệt vọng, Kuga bị đẩy vào một phòng trùm bí mật, nổi tiếng là nơi khiến bất kỳ ai từng vào sẽ không bao giờ có thể quay lại hầm ngục nữa. Ở đó, anh gặp một nữ ma cà rồng xinh đẹp tên Alicia.

Dù đã chuẩn bị tâm lý đối mặt với cái chết, Alicia lại bị thu hút bởi ý tưởng phát sóng trực tiếp và đề nghị: "Anh có thể dạy tôi cách phát sóng không?" Không còn nơi nào để đi, Kuga miễn cưỡng chấp nhận đề nghị của cô, và cuộc phiêu lưu stream săn các thám hiểm gia hầm ngục chưa từng có bắt đầu.

Vì lý do nào đó, buổi phát sóng của họ nhanh chóng trở nên nổi tiếng. Đồng thời, Kuga dần dần thức tỉnh một sức mạnh bí ẩn… Và trong khi đó, những điều kỳ lạ bắt đầu xảy ra với những người bạn từng trục xuất anh ta khỏi nhóm...

description.en: Remake of the Imperial Grail War from the Koha-Ace manga. The protagonist is Akagi Kanata, who gets transported 75 years to the past to participate in a Holy Grail War in the midst of World War 2.
description.es: Remake de la Guerra del Grial Imperial, manga publicado en la revista Koha-ace. Nuestro protagonista es Kanata Akagi, un chico de secundaria normal que de un día para otro es transportado 75 años al pasado para participar en una Guerra del Grial en medio del Japón de la Segunda Guerra Mundial.
description.fr: Remake de la guerre du Graal impérial tiré du manga Koha-Ace. Le protagoniste est Akagi Kanata, qui est transporté 75 ans dans le passé pour participer à une guerre du Graal en plein milieu de la Seconde Guerre mondiale.
description.pt: Remake da guerra do graal imperial do mangá Koha-Ace. O protagonista é Akagi Kanata, que é transportado 75 anos para o passado para participar de uma Guerra do Santo Graal no meio da Segunda Guerra Mundial.
description.ru: Ремейк пародийной манги KOHA-ACE GO, изображавшей Войну Святого Грааля на Дальнем Востоке в юмористическом стиле. Примечательно, что в оригинальной сюжетной линии фигурировали персонажи из cерии «Tsukihime». Благодаря магическому артефакту Акаги Каната, потомок изжившего себя магического рода, переносится в Токио 1945-го года. Ещё полыхают огни Второй мировой Войны, но в её тени происходит другая битва — Война за Святой Грааль, сражение между магами и их фамильярами, могущественными героями прошлого. Вместе с Фудзимией Цукумо, магом, которая видит в Войне Грааля свой единственный шанс, Каната призывает Слугу сильнейшего класса Сэйбер — девушку-самурая в бирюзовом хаори. Ситуация кажется безнадёжной, но возможно, именно у Канаты может оказаться ключ к тому, как закончится эта Война.
description.vi:
Bản remake của bộ Cuộc Chiến Chén Thánh Đế Đô từ manga Koha-Ace. 
Kể về Kanata Akagi, một thanh niên bình thường thuộc một gia tộc pháp sư sắp suy tàn sống từ thời hiện đại bị du hành thời gian về quá khứ năm 75, và tham gia Cuộc Chiến Chén Thánh thời điểm đó.

altTitles.ja-ro: Bocchi the Rock! Gaiden: Hiroi Kikuri no Fukazake Nikki

description.en:
25 years old Kikuri Hiroi is a "genius bassist" who leads the indie band "SICK HACK" and loves alcohol. 
She often gets drunk and breaks the equipment of the live house, so she's often short of money. 
She lives in a 52-year-old apartment without a bath, and sometimes borrows showers from her friends and acquaintances. 
Regularly attacked by anxiety about her future, she counters that with a alcohol-fueled "happiness spiral". What is her daily life like...?!

altTitles.ja: ルサンチマン

description.en: Takuro Sakamoto is a 30-year-old loser still living with his parents. Fed up with his dead-end job and his life in general he’s persuaded by a friend to try out virtual reality games. But even his virtual partner Tsukiko or simply “Moon” turns out to be more trouble than expected.

altTitles.ja: バビル２世　ザ・リターナー

description.en:
(from ebookjapan):

After 40 years, "Babel II" is miraculously back!

This time, the enemy is the world's most powerful military nation, the United States of America! 

A supernatural battle of modern warfare vs. Babel II breaks out...!

altTitles.ja: 理解のあるカレンちゃん

description.en:
“You’re amazing for being alive another day!”

A Manga about an understanding girlfriend who rewards you with a “log-in bonus” every day.
description.pt-br:
“Você é incrível por estar vivo mais um dia!”

Um mangá sobre uma namorada compreensiva que recompensa você com um “bônus de login” todos os dias.

altTitles.ja: あかね噺

description.en: Rakugo--the ultimate form of storytelling, where everything in a story is expressed with just your body and words. Shinta and his daughter Akane have been seduced by this wonderful form of classical entertainment. Having observed her father strive to pass the shin'uchi rakugo test, Akane will take her own steps into this unique world!
description.fr:
Shinta s'est perfectionné 13 ans durant afin d'atteindre le statut de Shin'uchi, le plus haut rang des rakugo-ka. Mais malgré sa très bonne performance lors de l'examen de passage, le juge de l'épreuve, l'émérite Maître Arakawa Issho, a décidé de renvoyer de l'école Arakawa l'ensemble des participants sans donner davantage d'explication ! Ainsi s'arrêta nette la carrière de Shinta, qui avait tant sacrifié pour accomplir son rêve…
Mais Akane, la fille de Shinta qui admirait son père et son rakugo plus que tout, ne compte pas en rester là !
description.th:
ที่สุดแห่งศิลปะการเล่าเรื่องที่ใช้ผู้แสดงเพียงหนึ่งคนและเรื่องเล่าเพียงหนึ่งเรื่อง --- "ราคุโกะ" นักราคุโกะ อาราคาวะ ชินตะและอาคาเนะลูกสาวของเขาต่างก็หลงเสน่ห์ของความบันเทิงอันสุดแสนจะเรียบง่ายนี้ ในวันที่ชินตะขึ้นเวทีแสดงในการสอบเลื่อนชั้นเป็นชินอุจิ อาคาเนะเองก็ได้ชมการแสดงนั้นอยู่และเส้นทางของนักราคุโกะที่อาคาเนะตัดสินใจก้าวเดินไปก็คือ---- มังงะราคุโกะขนานแท้ที่เหล่านักราคุโกะล้วนมาประชันฝีมือฟาดฟันกันได้เปิดฉากขึ้นแล้ว!

(Source: MangaPlus)
description.pt-br: Rakugo - a forma perfeita de contar histórias, na qual tudo na história é expresso apenas com seu corpo e palavras. Shinta e sua filha, Akane, foram seduzidos por essa maravilhosa forma clássica de entretenimento. Observando seu pai treinar para passar no teste de Shin’uchi, Akane avança neste mundo único.

altTitles.ja: 勇者が帰ってきた

altTitles.th: สงครามนักรบผู้หวนคืน

description.en:
After saving one world, warrior Kim Minsu returns to Earth only to find that he’s lost everything… so he decides to destroy the world he used to call home.

In his rampage, he kills teenager Jeongsu Park and his family. But instead of dying normally, Jeongsu is transported to another world, where he finds that he’s now a warrior himself. After killing the demon king of this alternate world and honing his skills as a warrior, Jeongsu returns to earth, hell-bent on revenge against Minsu.

As the two warriors fight with the fate of their country in the balance, who will emerge victorious?
description.fr:
Après avoir sauvé un monde, le héros Minsu Kim revient sur Terre et découvre qu'il a tout perdu. Il décide donc de détruire le monde qu'il avait l'habitude d'appeler ‘chez lui’. Dans son saccage, il tue le héros Jeongsu Park, mais au lieu de mourir normalement, Jeongsu est transporté dans un autre monde. Après avoir tué le roi démon de ce monde alternatif et grandi en tant que héros, Jeongsu revient sur terre, déterminé à se venger de Minsu. Alors que les deux héros se battent avec le destin de leur pays en jeu, qui sortira vainqueur?

description.zh:
被黑化勇士们毁灭的世界，
绝望之中最后的勇士归来！
经历千辛万苦最终回到地球的勇士金闵洙，可等他的却是人们冰冷的眼光和父母双亡的事实，绝望的他决定毁灭整个世界。男主朴正秀的家人也被陷入到了这场灾难之中…就在这时，朴正秀也被传送到了异世！勇士朴正秀能否拯救这个世界呢？

---

title.en: Gyakkou Shita Akuyaku Reijou wa, Naze ka Maryoku wo Ushinattanode Shinsou no Reijou ni Narimasu

altTitles.ja: 逆行した悪役令嬢は、なぜか魔力を失ったので深窓の令嬢になります

altTitles.en: The Villainess Who Traveled Back in Time Inexplicably Lost Her Magic, so She Went Into Seclusion
Somehow, the Villainess Who Regressed in Time Lost Her Magic Power, so She Turned Into a Secluded Maiden

altTitles.zh-hk: 逆行的惡役大小姐、在不知為何失去了魔力之後變成了深閨大小姐

altTitles.zh: 逆行的恶役大小姐、在不知为何失去了魔力之后变成了深闺大小姐

altTitles.id: Villainess yang Kehilangan Sihirnya  Setelah Kembali ke Masa Lalu  Memilih Untuk Mengurung Diri

description.en:
Rachel was chosen as the Crown Prince’s fiancée solely by virtue of the immense magical powers she possessed. Thus, when the Saint appeared, she feared that her most coveted position would get snatched away from her.

Spurred by jealousy, Rachel committed evil deeds against the Saint, resulting in her engagement getting broken. As further punishment, she was sent away to a monastery, but her carriage was attacked by bandits *en route*. Just when she thought that death was imminent, she woke up with a start… only to find herself three years in the past — with almost all of her magic gone, and her body so frail and weak that she could barely even leave her bed!

Determined to prevent fate from repeating itself, Rachel resolved to take full advantage of this second chance and call off her engagement pronto. But for some reason, the Crown Prince keeps refusing to break things off with her—?!

---
[Original Web Novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n9460fv/)
description.id:
Rachel dipilih sebagai tunangan putra mahkota hanya karena kekuatan sihir besar yang dimilikinya, Lalu, ketika sang santa muncul, dia takut kalau posisinya sebagai tunangan akan direbut darinya. 
Akhirnya, karena terbakar api cemburu, Rachel melakukan tindakan jahat kepada sang santa yang mengakibatkan tunangannya dibatalkan.
Kemudian setelah itu dia dihukum dengan dikirim ke kuil terpencil, tapi pada saat perjalanan, kendaraannya diserang oleh sekawanan bandit. 
Sesaat dia berpikir kalau kematiannya tidak akan bisa dihindari, dia ternyata telah terbangun dari tidurnya dan menyadari kalau dirinya telah kembali 3 tahun lalu bersamaan dengan menghilangnya kekuatan sihirnya.
Karena diberi kesempatan untuk mengulangi kembali kehidupannya, Rachel memutuskan memanfaatkan kesempatan ini untuk segera membatalkan pertunangannya sendiri.
Akan tetapi tidak disangka-sangka, sang putra mahkota malah menolak pembatalan pertunangannya, kira-kira kenapa ya?
description.ja:
魔力の高さから王太子の婚約者となるも、聖女の出現によりその座を奪われることを恐れたラシェル。
聖女に悪逆非道な行いをしたことで婚約破棄されて修道院送りとなり、
修道院へ向かう道中で賊に襲われて殺されてしまう。

死んだと思ったラシェルが目覚めると、なぜか3年前に戻っていたが
ほとんどの魔力を失い、ベッドから起き上がれないほどの病弱な体になってしまった。

今度は周りの人も自分も幸せな未来をつかむため、
これ幸いと今度はこちらから王太子との婚約を破棄しようとするが、
なぜか王太子が婚約破棄を拒否してきて!?
しかも魔力を失ったと思っていたのに、世界初の闇の精霊が私のもとへ!?

悪役令嬢が精霊と共に未来を変える異世界ハッピーファンタジー！
電子限定描き下ろし特典付き！

---
[Original Web Novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n9460fv/)

altTitles.ja-ro: Jijyou wo Shiranai Tenkousei ga Guigui Kuru

altTitles.pt: O Aluno Sem Noção Transferido É Assertivo

altTitles.ja: 事情を知らない転校生がグイグイくる。

altTitles.zh-hk: 什麼情況都不知道的轉校生一個勁的湊過來。

altTitles.uk: Цей безглуздий переведений учень такий настирливий. Мій дивакуватий друг

altTitles.en: The Clueless Transfer Student Is Assertive.

altTitles.pt-br: Meu Primeiro Amigo é um Tapado

description.en: Akane Nishimura is a shy and gloomy elementary school girl with an unfounded dire reputation in her class due to her appearance. Taiyou Takada is a transfer student in her class who came from a small countryside school, and who is fascinated by the aspects of Nishimura that her classmates use to pick on her, finding her "darkness" cool beyond compare. Through the unbridled and fundamental joy Takada finds in being her friend, Nishimura starts realizing that being herself is not as bad as she thinks.
description.uk: Акане Нішімура — сором’язлива та похмура дівчинка початкової школи, яка через свою зовнішність має безпідставну жахливу репутацію у своєму класі. Тайо Такада — новий учень, який перевівся з невеликої сільської школи, і якому подобається унікальність Нішімури, яку її однокласники використовують, щоб познущатися з неї, вважаючи, що її «темрява» виглядає моторошно. Через нестримну та фундаментальну радість, яку проявляє Такада, будучи її другом, Нішімура починає розуміти, що бути собою не так вже й погано, як вона думала.
description.pt-br: Nishimura é uma garota retraída, hostilizada por todos os colegas por seu jeito sombrio, que dizem até que ela é a Morte em pessoa. Mas isso só chama ainda mais a atenção de Takada, um novo aluno transferido. Sem saber o motivo do apelido, que por sinal ele acha super-maneiro, Takada começa a se aproximar mais e mais da Nishimura para se tornar amigo dela. Uma história cativante, cheia de nostalgia dos nossos tempos de fundamental, sobre uma amizade que vai aquecer seus corações!

title.en: Akuyaku Reijo no Ani ni Tensei Shimashita

altTitles.ja: 悪役令嬢の兄に転生しました

description.en:
"Onii-tama?"
Cain, who reincarnated as one of the love interests of an otome game, screamed at the loveliness of his sister, Diana. I can't believe that this angel is going to be a villainess with countless bad ends-- No, there is no way that such a future can exist! Clenching his fist tightly, he raises his sister into a gentle lady, while also dispelling the darkness held by the love interests in place of the heroine. Relying on his game knowledge from his previous life and an orphaned chamberlain. Everything for his beloved sister--
description.id:
"Abwang?"

Cain, orang yang baru saja bereinkarnasi menjadi salah satu target kencan di sebuah otome game, tiba-tiba berteriak karena melihat keimutan adik perempuannya, Diana.
Aku tidak menyangka kalau malaikat kecil ini akan menjadi seorang villainess dengan akhir yang tragis-- Tidak, aku tidak akan membiarkan masa depan seperti itu terjadi!
Dengan mengepalkan tangannya, dia bertekat untuk membesarkan adik perempuannya menjadi seorang wanita yang baik hati dan tidak sombong, sembari menghilangkan segala masa lalu yang buruk dari para target kencan lain menggantikan sang tokoh utama.
Bergantung pada pengetahuannya tentang gamenya di kehidupan yang dulu dan juga pengalamannya sebagai anak yatim piastu, semuanya dilakukan demi adik perempuannya-- dan akhirnya, tantangan bagi sang kakak akan dimulai sekarang!
description.ja: ゲーム実況中に過労死し、乙女ゲームのキャラ・カインに転生した俺は、妹・ディア―ナの圧倒的可愛さに心を奪われた。しかし、このままゲーム世界が進んでいけば、妹は辺境の地で凌辱されたり、暗殺者に殺される壮絶なバットエンドを迎えると決まっていた。「この世界で妹を幸せにする!!」そう誓った俺は妹を淑女に育てながら、ゲームのシナリオに逆らっていく。そう、すべては愛する妹のため……。「おにーたま、ディ、にんじんもたべたのです!」「えらい! ディアーナは何て素晴らしいんだ!!!」

altTitles.ja: 飯だけ食ってレベルアップ

altTitles.th: กินจุทะลุเลเวล

description.en:
Kang Minhyuk suffers from a rare disorder that makes it impossible for him to stop eating. Despite strict diet and exercise, Minhyuk’s weight is now life-threatening. As a last resort, his doctor recommends a unique treatment—Athenae, a VR game where one can eat as much as they want without consequence. Crispy fried chicken! Scrumptious samgyetang! Inside Athenae, all food tastes real, but earning it is no cakewalk. In order to live, Minhyuk must go on the ultimate fantasy gourmet adventure!

Menderita penyakit langka di mana hanya ada dua orang penderita di seluruh dunia, Minhyuk harus hidup sambil mengontrol nafsu makannya. Segala cara sudah dicoba untuk mengurangi berat badan Minhyuk, namun itu hanya semakin membuatnya lapar hingga dokter pribadinya menyarankan 'Athenae'. Sebuah VR Game di mana pemainnya bisa makan sepuasnya di dalam sana tanpa khawatir berat badan naik. Begitulah petualangan Minhyuk dimulai, tentu saja ditemani makanan-makanan lezat pada setiap quest-nya!

description.it:
personaggio principale è colpito da una rara condizione che colpisce solo due persone in tutto il mondo, la bulimia. Organizza i suoi pasti quotidiani per sopravvivere, ma la sua speranza di sopravvivenza si affievolisce con il passare dei giorni. Consulta un medico, che gli suggerisce di giocare al gioco della realtà alternativa "Athenae", dove può mangiare quanto vuole senza ingrassare. Gioca per salvarsi la vita e crescere in forza non facendo altro che mangiare! Una vita fantastica da gourmet!

サクサクのチキン、伸びるチーズのピザ、夜中の1時に食べるラーメン！ ただおいしいものが食べたいだけなのに… 「暴食欠如症」どれだけ食べても食欲が満たされない奇病。 俺はこの病気のせいで体重170キロの巨漢になり、とうとう生命まで危なくなってしまう！ そこで新しい治療法として仮想現実ゲーム「アテネ」をすることに。 そこでは味が感じられて、おまけにラーメン100杯食べても太らない世界！ たくさん食べたい一心でプレイしていただけなのに、どんどんレベルアップしていって…!?

하루하루 살기 위해 먹는 걸 조절하며 살아가고 있지만 희망이 없어보인다,

คังมินฮยอก เป็นผู้ป่วยโรคกินไม่หยุด หนึ่งในโรคหายากที่มีแค่ไม่กี่คนในโลก

description.zh:
敏赫身高185cm，他控制食量，每天运动4个小时，可他的体重却只能控制在170kg。他家境优渥、成绩优异，各方面都很完美，除了体重。这都是因为他患有罕见的暴食性缺失症。不管吃多少东西，他都无法得到满足。完美体验味觉感受的虚拟现实游戏——雅典，也许是可以解救他的最后一把钥匙？！

主角患有全世界只有兩名患者的
罕見疾病——「暴食型飽足感缺失症」，
為了活下去，他每日努力控制飲食，
卻仍看不見希望。

在醫生的建議下，
他進入了虛擬實境遊戲《雅典奈》，
在遊戲裡，就算盡情大吃也不會變胖。
為了活下去而開始玩遊戲的他，
展開了一段美食雲集的奇幻人生!

title.en: One Day a Message Window Appeared Out of Nowhere!?

altTitles.ja: ある日突然メッセージウィンドウが表示されたんですけど！？

altTitles.ja-ro: Aru Hi Totsuzen Message Window ga Hyoujisaretan desu kedo!?
Aru Hi Totsuzen Messeeji Windou ga Hyoujisaretandesukedo!?

description.en:
The protagonist, a university student named Kazuya Hayakawa woke up one day with a message window that shows up in his field of view. This window is always visible to him, and when certain lines are displayed in it, he gets thrown into confusion.

From that day onward began Hayakawa's daily ordeal of getting manipulated by this message window.

(Source: Amazon JP)
description.ja:
主人公・早川一哉はある日目が覚めるとメッセージウィンドウが見えるようになってしまった。
常に表示されるそのウィンドウにはとあるセリフが表示され主人公を混乱させる。

この日から早川一哉のメッセージウィンドウに振り回される苦難の日々が始まった。

altTitles.ru: Приди же в Мир Демонов, Ирума-кун!

altTitles.th: อิรุมะคุงกับโรงเรียนปิศาจ

altTitles.ja: 魔入りました！入間くん

altTitles.id: Selamat datang di sekolah iblis! Iruma-kun

description.en:
Iruma Suzuki, fourteen years old, can’t say no to any request. His irresponsible parents make him work dangerous job after dangerous job to support them, and then one day they sell him to a demon! But, much to his surprise, the demon wants to adopt Iruma as his grandson? Unable to refuse his request, Iruma becomes the grandson of the great demon Sullivan. His new doting demon grandfather enrolls him in Demon School Babyls – where Sullivan is coincidentally the principal. Thus begins Iruma-kun's extraordinary school life among the otherworldly, meeting many colorful demons, taking on daunting challenges, and facing his true self as he rises to become someone great. 

Cozy magical slice of life with occasional urban terrorism.
description.es:
Con una vida bastante desgraciada y unos padres vagos y avaros, Iruma es arrastrado al infierno contra su voluntad después de que estos lo vendan a un demonio. Pero para su sorpresa, la vida que le depara el inframundo es mucho mejor que la que tenía con su familia.

Bajo la tutela de su nuevo dueño, un poderoso, pero solitario demonio que sólo quería cumplir su anhelo de tener un nieto, empieza a asistir a un instituto del que este es director después de firmar cierto contrato con él.

Ahora, Iruma tiene que intentar adaptarse al mundo de los demonios mientras esconde su naturaleza humana y se enfrenta a los distintos desafíos que lo esperan en su nuevo instituto. ¡Su nueva vida demoníaca acaba de empezar!
description.ru: Четырнадцатилетний Судзуки Ирума только что был брошен и продан демону его безответственными родителями! Тем не менее, к своему удивлению, он оказывается теперь живет с демоном, как его приёмный внук. Затем он поступил в школу, где его дед — Салливан, работает в качестве директора. Так начинается необычайная школьная жизнь Ирумы-куна среди потусторонних, встречая много красочных лиц, принимая на себя сложные задачи, и сталкиваясь со своим истинным — я, когда он поднимается, чтобы стать кем-то великим. Уютная волшебная повседневность с случайным городским терроризмом.
description.tr: On dört yaşındaki Iruma Suzuki hiçbir isteğe hayır diyemez. Sorumsuz ailesi, onları geçinmek için onu tehlikeli işlerden tehlikeli işlere koşturtur ve sonra bir gün onu bir iblise satarlar! Ancak iblis, Iruma'yı torunu olarak evlat edinmek isteyince çok şaşırır. Bu isteği reddedemeyen Iruma, büyük iblis Sullivan'ın torunu olur. Yeni sevecen iblis dedesi onu, Sullivan'ın tesadüfen müdürü olduğu İblis Okulu Babyls'e kaydettirir. Böylece Iruma-kun'un diğer dünyadakiler arasındaki sıra dışı okul hayatı başlar; birçok renkli iblisle tanışır, zorlu mücadelelere atılır ve büyük biri olmak için yükselirken gerçek benliğiyle yüzleşir.
description.vi: Mairimashita! Iruma-kun là câu chuyện kể về cậu bé Suzuki Iruma, người đã bị bố mẹ mình kí khế ước bán cho ác ma để đổi lấy tiền tài và bình an. Cậu bé Iruma đáng thương từ lúc mới biết đi (1 tuổi) đã phải "ra xã hội" lăn lộn, buôn ba khắp nơi với hai vị phụ huynh "tưng tửng" cho đến ngày một Ác Ma đến rước cậu đến Ma giới theo khế ước. Tưởng chừng như sắp vào bụng quỷ thì vị Ác Ma già nua này đã khóc lóc yêu cầu cậu làm cháu trai ông ta, với bản tính lương thiện và tốt bụng đến cả bản thân mình cũng phải kinh ngạc, cậu bất đắc dĩ đã đồng ý lời đề nghị đó và nhập học trường Ác Ma theo ý ông ta. Chuyện gì sẽ xảy ra tiếp theo, mời các bạn theo dõi cuộc sống học đường đầy bất thường của Iruma-kun.
description.pt-br:
Iruma Suzuki, de quatorze anos, não pode dizer não a nenhum pedido. Seus pais irresponsáveis ​​o fazem trabalhar em empregos perigosos para sustentá-los, e então um dia eles o vendem para um demônio! Mas, para sua surpresa, o demônio quer adotar Iruma como seu neto?  

Incapaz de recusar seu pedido, Iruma torna-se neto do grande demônio Sullivan. Seu novo avô demônio amoroso o matricula na Demon School Babyls - onde Sullivan é coincidentemente o diretor. Assim começa a extraordinária vida escolar de Iruma-kun entre o outro mundo, encontrando muitos demônios coloridos, enfrentando desafios assustadores e enfrentando seu verdadeiro eu enquanto ele se torna alguém grande.

[ 1° TEMP. DO ANIME ADAPTOU ATÉ: Vol. 7, Cap 44. ]
[ 2° TEMP. DO ANIME ADAPTOU ATÉ: Vol. 11, Cap 94. ]
[ 3° TEMP. DO ANIME ADAPTOU ATÉ: Vol. 17, metade do Cap 147.]

altTitles.ja: 逃がさないよ？ 袋路くん

description.en:
The story revolves around Fukuroji, a high school boy who tries to live in the shadows.

However, his life takes an unexpected turn when, as part of a punishment game, he has to confess his love to the most popular girl in his class. Through a misunderstanding, he ends up confessing his feelings to Tsubaki Sakura, the most feared girl in school.

As he tries to clear up the confusion, Tsubaki surprisingly attacks him, adding an unexpected and hilarious twist to the situation.
description.ja:
**エッチな捕食者たちからは逃げられない!? 草食男子の泥沼性春ラブコメディー**

目立たないように日々を過ごしている男子高校生・袋路は、ある日、罰ゲームでクラスのアイドルに告白することに。しかし、彼は学園で最も恐れられている強面女子・椿さくらに間違えて告白してしまう。誤解を解こうと袋路は、二人きりで椿に説明しようとするが、いきなり彼女は制服を脱ぎだして…!?

altTitles.ja: とんがり帽子のアトリエ

description.en:
In a world where everyone takes wonders like magic spells and dragons for granted, Coco is a girl with a simple dream: she wants to be a wizard. 
But everybody knows magicians are born, not made, and she was not born with a gift for magic. 
Resigned to her un-magical life, Coco is about to give up on her dream until the day she meets Qifrey, a mysterious traveling magician. After secretly watching him perform magic in a way she’s never seen before, Coco soon learns what everybody “knows” might not be the truth and discovers that her magical dream may not be as far away as it seems…
  
- Winner of the 2020 Eisner Award for Best U.S. Edition of International Material-Asia.  
- Winner of the Best Manga award at the 2020 Harvey Awards.  


---

title.en: Watashi ga Koibito ni Nareru Wake Naijan, Muri Muri! (Muri Janakatta!?)

altTitles.ja: わたしが恋人になれるわけないじゃん、ムリムリ！（※ムリじゃなかった!?）

altTitles.id: Mana Mungkin Aku Bisa Jadi Kekasihmu! (Ternyata Mungkin!?)

altTitles.zh: 我怎么可能成为你的恋人，不行不行！（※不是不可能！？）

altTitles.zh-hk: 我怎麼可能成為你的戀人，不行不行！（※不是不可能！？）

altTitles.zh-ro: Wǒ zěnme kěnéng chéngwéi nǐ de liànrén, bùxíng bùxíng!(※Bùshì bù kěnéng!?)

altTitles.en: There’s No Freaking Way I’ll be Your Lover! Unless…

description.en:
Longing to be a normie, I, Renako Amaori, am finally making my high school debut after working so hard for it. However due to my communication impairment, I have a gloomy aura. And after being in the normie group day in day out, I got so exhausted and said “I can't do this anymore,” and reached my limit!

During that time, I accidentally met the top student of our school. Perfect in face and figure, unrivaled in sword and pen, our school's best high school girl: Mai Odzuka.
We found in each other someone who we could open to and talk about our own troubles. What a nice friend I made, now I can surely get back on my own feet…is what I thought!

"It seems that you, even as a girl, have made me fall in love with you."
What!? Mai suddenly confessed to me. Wait! What about our friendship?

And so, we now have different feelings we can’t tell each other: friendship or a romantic relationship. We’re now presenting each other its benefits and put them into practice to see what kind of relationship works best for us. Will I succeed with a successful high school life…?
description.pt-br: A desajeitada e introvertida Amaori Renako está deixando sua vida solitária no ensino médio para trás, determinada a se tornar uma estudante extrovertida e popular. A glamorosa e confiante Oduka Mai é o oposto total de Renako: rica, despreocupada e literalmente uma modelo fashion. Contra todas as probabilidades, as duas garotas formam uma conexão imediata. Renako acha que pode ter encontrado a melhor amiga dos seus sonhos… até que a confissão de amor de Mai deixa seus sentimentos em parafuso. Renako quer provar a Mai que ser melhores amigas é melhor do que ser namoradas, mas Mai está decidida a convencer Renako de que elas estão destinadas a serem amantes!

altTitles.en: Scary Face High Schooler and Miss Plain Jane
Scary-Faced High Schooler and Miss Plain Jane

altTitles.ja: コワモテ高校生と地味子さん

description.en:
“I’ve come back for you.” The handsome boy who moved away ten years ago has returned… with a super scary face?!  
  
Sachi, the 26 year-old manager of a little florist shop, was closing up when suddenly a high schooler with a terrifying face approached saying, “I came as promised.”   
  
The manly and earnest high schooler with a terrifying face X the super dull plain jane, in a heart bursting love story! ♥   
 <Translated from comic.pixiv>

altTitles.es: La hija más querida del villano

altTitles.th: บุตรสาวผู้ล้ำค่าของวายร้าย

altTitles.ja: 悪党公爵の愛娘

altTitles.vi: Đứa Con Gái Quý Giá Của Nhân Vật Phản Diện
Cô Công Chúa Nhỏ Của Kẻ Phản Diện

description.en:
Volám sa Rosaria von Valencia, ale nie vždy som sa tak volala. Podľa knihy, ktorú som čítala, ma mali zavraždiť namiesto svätice Cordelie len preto, že sa na ňu podobám. Rozhodla som sa utiecť, aby som sa nikdy nestretla so svojím budúcim vrahom, vojvodom Valenciom, ale nakoniec som naňho narazila, keď bol na pokraji smrti. Po tom, čo som ho zachránila v nádeji, že ma v budúcnosti ušetrí, si ma adoptoval za svoju dcéru! Teraz, keď ma môj nový otec rozmaznáva láskou, znamená to, že budem žiť až do konca?

description.es:
Ya es injusto que sufrí mucho porque me parezco mucho a la Santa, pero ¿por qué el villano me mató sin piedad?No, en realidad, decía en el libro que estaba destinado a morir.'Mi vida ya está arruinada. De todas las cosas, ¿por qué tengo que ser yo quien tenga una muerte ridícula?¡Todavía hay esperanza! Todavía no he conocido a ninguno de los personajes, ¡así que me escaparé!Pero, ¿por qué el villano colapsó frente a mí...?Con mucho esfuerzo, apenas salvé la vida del villano que estaba al borde de la muerte.¡¿Pero ahora dice que quería adoptarme como su hija y criarme para ser una Santa?!Así como así, decidí convertirme en su hija por unos días antes de irme en silencio.—Mi hija es un genio. No hay niña más angelical en este mundo que mi hija.…Creo que he engatusado a mi padre demasiado bien.Incluso los chicos que originalmente seguían a la verdadera Santa empezaron a prestarme atención.¿Qué salió mal? ¡¿No se supone que ustedes me odian?!

---

description.id:
Namaku Cordelia, sama seperti nama saintess yang parasnya juga mirip sekali denganku. Menurut buku yang aku baca, di masa depan nanti aku akan mati di tangan seorang duke yang salah mengiraku sebagai saintess. Aku bermaksud untuk kabur dari takdir itu, tapi aku malah bertemu dengan sang duke jahat dan dia mengangkatku sebagai anaknya! "Tidak masalah kan kalau aku jadi anak angkatnya sebentar?" Apakah aku akan bernasib sama isi buku itu? Omong-omong, aku baca di mana ya buku itu?

---

description.ko:
성녀와 닮았다는 이유로 납치당한 것도 억울한데
악당은 가차 없이 나를 죽였다.

아니, 그렇게 죽을 거라고 책에 쓰여 있었다.

‘이번 생은 망했어. 하필이면 어이없이 죽는 역할이야?’

아직 희망은 있었다.
등장인물들과 아무도 만나지 않은 지금, 도망쳐야 한다!
그런데 왜 악당이 내 앞에 쓰러져 있지……?

죽을 고비에서 겨우 악당을 구했더니
이젠 그가 성녀가 될 재목이라며 나를 딸로 입양했다?!
기왕 이렇게 된 거, 며칠 딸 노릇 하다가 조용히 떠나려고 했는데

“내 딸은 천재다. 내 딸처럼 천사 같은 아이는 이 세상에 없지.”

……아빠를 너무 잘 꼬셔 버린 것 같다.

심지어 진짜 성녀를 따라다니던 남자들도 내게 관심을 갖기 시작했다.

왜 이래? 나 너희들 싫거든?!

description.ru:
Я знала, что моя судьба быть похищенной и убитой потому что мы со святой похожи.
Планировала сбежать до того, как снова встречусь с злым герцогом, но...
Не могу поверить, что я упала у него на глазах!
И он даже спас меня от смерти и удочерил!
Несколько дней я старалась играть в хорошего ребенка, но неожиданно герцог становился дураком, зависимый от своей дочери...

description.vi:
Vì gần giống với Thánh nữ mà chịu nhiều đau khổ, đã là rất bất công rồi, nhưng sao nhân vật phản diện lại xuống tay với mình không một chút thương sót chứ?

Không, thật ra, ở trong sách, mình sẽ chết như vậy.

“Cuộc đời mình bị huỷ hoại cả rồi. Sau tất cả, sao mình lại phải chịu một cái chết lố bịch như vậy chứ?”

Mình vẫn còn cơ hội! Mình vẫn chưa chạm mặt bất kì nhân vật nào nên mình sẽ bỏ chạy!

Nhưng sao nhân vật phản diện lại đổ gục trước mắt mình…?

Mình đã rất cố gắng để cứu sống nhân vật phản diện đang cận kề cái chết.

Nhưng anh ta nói muốn nhận mình làm con gái và nuôi dạy mình trở thành Thánh nữ?!

Và như thế, mình đồng ý trở thành con gái của anh ta vài ngày trước khi lẳng lặng rời đi.

“Con gái ta là thiên tài. Không có đứa trẻ nào trên thế giới này hơn được con gái ta đâu.”…Mình nghĩ mình nịnh cha rất tốt đó.

Ngay cả những người lúc đầu đi theo vị Thánh nữ thật cũng bắt đầu để ý đến mình.

Chuyện gì đây? Chẳng phải họ ghét mình á?

---

title.en: Josou Danshi wa Skirt wo Nugitai!

altTitles.ja: 女装男子はスカートを脱ぎたい！

altTitles.en: The Crossdressing Boy Wants to Take Off His Skirt

description.en: Uichiro, a junior high school boy, harbors a secret he cannot share with his childhood friend, Tama-chan. He has been cross-dressing for her because she has a phobia of men. This is a thrilling yet agonizing comedy about a boy who cross-dresses for the girl he loves!
description.ja:
男子中学生の宇一郎には、幼馴染のたまちゃんに言えないある秘密があった。
それは男性恐怖症である彼女のために「女の子を演じている」ということ。
想いを寄せる少女のために女装を続ける年頃男子のドキドキ悶絶コメディ！！

altTitles.th: ก๊วนป่วนชวนบุ๋งบุ๋ง

altTitles.ja: ぐらんぶる

description.en:
A new life begins for Kitahara Iori as he begins his college career near the ocean in Izu city, full of excitement for his new life. 
He will be moving into his uncle's diving store "Grand Blue." There he finds the ocean, beautiful women, and men that love diving and alcohol. 
Will Iori be able to live his dream college life?

---
**Links:**
- Alternative Official English - [K MANGA](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10058/episode/318585) (U.S. Only), [INKR](https://comics.inkr.com/title/306-grand-blue-dreaming)
description.fa: ⁧⁧ «کیتاهارا ایوری» پسری است که برای شروع دوره دانشجویی خود به شهر دریایی «ایزو» می رود؛ او که از روبرو شدن با زندگی جدید خود اشتیاق فراوانی دارد به این فکر است که در فروشگاه لوازم غواصی عموی خود که به نام Grand Blue (گرند بلو) شناخته می شود مشغول به کار شود. آنجا او دریایی پر از دلخوشی را می یابد، دخترانی زیبا را به چشم می بیند و همچنین مردانی که عاشق غواصی هستند و وقت خودشان را به نوشیدن انواع نوشیدنی ها می گذرانند ملاقات می کند. حال باید دید که ایوری می تواند زندگی دانشجویی دلخواهش را در این شهر دنبال کند یا خیر؟!
description.ja: 海沿いの街で一人暮らしを始めた北原伊織は衝撃の大学デビューを果たす。出会ったのは美女とダイビング、そして愛すべき野郎ども！
description.ru: Новая жизнь Китахары Ёри начинается с момента поступления в колледж, который находится на берегу океана в городе Идзу. В предвкушении новых эмоций парень отправляется в дазин своего дяди «Необъятный океан». Здесь его ждет красивый океан, прекрасные женщины и мужчины, что любят дайвинг и алкоголь. Сможет ли Ёри прожить студенческую жизнь своей мечты?
description.pt-br: Uma nova vida começa para Kitahara Iori, que entrou na faculdade perto do mar, na cidade de Izu. Emocionado por um novo começo, ele se muda para casa do seu tio, uma loja de mergulho chamada "Grand Blue". Lá, ele encontra um lindo oceano, belas mulheres, e os homens que gostam de mergulho e álcool... Será que Iori vai ser capaz de viver sua tão sonhada vida universitária? Do mesmo autor de Baka to Test to Shoukanjuu, uma nova comédia começa!

altTitles.ja: ダイヤモンドの功罪

description.en: Despite his athletic gifts, Ayasegawa Jiro is a loner who causes others to lose or give up on their dreams, all because of him. While struggling with his loneliness, he discovers the "Bambies," an uncompetitive baseball team whose motto is "having fun." Jiro finds joy in his baseball life with his teammates, but...This is a baseball youth drama that explores the relationship between a genius and his peers.

title.en: Shouwaru Tensai Osananajimi to no Shoubu ni Makete Hatsutaiken o Zenbu Ubawareru Hanashi

altTitles.ja: 性悪天才幼馴染との勝負に負けて初体験を全部奪われる話

altTitles.ja-ro: Shouwaru Tensai Osananajimi to no Shoubu ni Makete Hatsutaiken wo Zenbu Ubawareru Hanashi

altTitles.th: เรื่องราวของการพ่ายแพ้การแข่งขันให้กับเพื่อนสมัยเด็กอัจฉริยะตัวร้ายผู้คอยพรากประสบการณ์ครั้งแรกทุกอย่างไป

altTitles.zh: 败给了性格恶劣的天才青梅，初体验全部被夺走这件事

altTitles.zh-hk: 敗給了性格惡劣的天才青梅，初體驗全部被奪走這件事

altTitles.en: How I Lose Bets With My Sadistic Gifted Childhood Friend and She Steals All of My Firsts

description.en:
A twisted girls' love story featuring: A devilish girl hiding behind the mask of an honor student x An ordinary girl who hates losing.

Wakaba Yoshizawa has a childhood friend named Komaki Umezono.

This girl wore the mask of an honor student with good morals who's blessed with both beauty and brains, but in reality she's an evil genius who looked down on people. For the sake of regaining the dignity she lost to Komaki, Wakaba challenges her to a match, but Komaki tells her "Each time I win, I will take one precious thing from you." as a condition!? Every time she loses to the girl she "hates", her true feelings get exposed.

(Source: Young Ace Up)
description.ja:
「嫌い」な彼女に負けるたび、曝け出されるホントの気持ち――。

吉沢わかばの幼馴染、梅園小牧。彼女は、品行方正で才色兼備な優等生の仮面を被った、人を見下す性悪女だった。そんな小牧に奪われた尊厳を取り戻すため、彼女に勝負を挑むわかばだったが、「私が勝ったらわかばの大事なものを一つずつ奪う」という条件をつけられて――!?ファーストキスに始まり、一つ一つ「尊厳」を奪われていく中で、小牧に抱く気持ちが「嫌い」だけでないことに気付きーー？
description.th: อุเมะโซโนะ โคมากิ เพื่อนสมัยเด็กของ โยชิซาวะ วาคาบะ เธอสวมหน้ากากนักเรียนดีเด่นทั้งที่เป็นผู้หญิงชั่วร้าย ที่ชอบดูถูกผู้คน เพื่อกอบกู้ศักดิ์ศรีที่โคมากิแย่งชิงไปจากเธอ วาคาบะ จึงต้องแข่งขันกับเธอ โดยมีเงื่อนไขว่าถ้าชนะ เธอจะพรากสิ่งสำคัญหนึ่งอย่างของวาคาบะไป...!? "ฉันเกลียดเธอ!" ถึงจะเป็นแบบนั้น ทุกครั้งที่พ่ายแพ้ความรู้สึกที่แท้จริงก็ค่อย ๆ ถูกเปิดเผยออกมา
description.es-la:
¡Una distorsionada historia de amor entre la estudiante modelo con una máscara demoníaca y la chica común que no se rinde!

Wakaba Yoshizawa, la amiga de la infancia de Wakaba, Komaizumi Komaki. Ella era una chica malvada que llevaba una máscara de estudiante modelo perfecta y talentosa, que miraba por encima del hombro a los demás. Wakaba desafía a Komaki para recuperar su dignidad que le fue arrebatada, pero se le pone una condición: "Si gano, tomaré una cosa importante de Wakaba una por una" ¡Cada vez que pierde contra ella, revela sus verdaderos sentimientos! ¡Una emocionante historia de amor entre chicas que ganó el Premio de Oro en el 28vo Concurso Sneaker Award, ahora en formato de cómic!
description.pt-br:
Uma história de amor distorcida entre garotas: uma garota diabólica escondida por trás da máscara de uma estudante exemplar x uma garota comum que odeia perder.

Wakaba Yoshizawa tem uma amiga de infância chamada Komaki Umezono.

Essa garota usava a máscara de uma estudante exemplar com boas virtudes, abençoada com beleza e inteligência, mas na realidade ela é uma gênio do mal que despreza as pessoas. Para recuperar a dignidade perdida para Komaki, Wakaba desafia-a para um duelo, mas Komaki lhe diz: "Cada vez que eu ganhar, vou tirar algo precioso de você." como condição!? Cada vez que ela perde para a garota que "odeia", seus verdadeiros sentimentos são expostos.

altTitles.ja: 獣王と薬草

description.en: Dungeons are the stuff of dreams—defeat the monsters, take their loot, and then venture into uncharted territory to discover hidden riches! Tina, an upstart adventurer with just such a dream, ends up mortally wounded while exploring a dungeon. Suddenly, the great demon known as the Beast King Garon, who was supposed to have been slain by a hero in the distant past, appears before her!  Dungeon fantasy meets medical drama!
description.ru:
Подземелья - это воплощение мечты…
Собирайте материалы с поверженных монстров,
добирайтесь до неисследованных мест и завладевайте сокровищами!
Тина, авантюристка, мечтает о таком успехе,
Исследуя подземелье, она получает тяжелое ранение.
Перед ней появляется сильнейший демон «Король зверей Гарон», когда-то в прошлом он должен был быть убит героем?..

Фэнтези и медицинская драма по мотивам подземелья от Konda Tatsukazu, автора оригинальной истории «Ginrou Bloodborne/Серебряный волк, рожденный в крови», начинается!

altTitles.ja: 突風とビート

description.en: Nike, a mysterious high school girl living in a small town by the sea in Hokkaido, begins a mysterious journey to find her forgotten self when she meets Nemoto, a boy who rarely shows up for class.
description.ja: おばけが視える“ニケ”と“ネモ”。非日常浮遊感ラブコメディ！　霊が視える…高校1年生のニケにとってそれはずいぶん前から当たり前の日常。ある日プリントを届けるために最近学校に来ていない同級生・ネモの家を訪れると、そこはあまりにも元気な霊たちであふれていた…！

description.en: It’s hard dating someone who won’t give you the time of day. Su-ae Shim knows that better than anyone, having dated her indifferent boyfriend, Minu Kang, for years. She sometimes wishes she could be more like her charismatic stepsister, Ra-im, who seems to have it all. But life takes a turn for the weird when Su-ae discovers Jellypop, a sentient flip phone, in her locker. Jellypop has a lot to say about her love life, especially as Su-ae drifts further away from Minu and finds herself running into Minu’s friend, Eunhyeok. Add to the mix a growing suspicion that Minu and Ra-im might be more than friends, and Su-ae might need a miracle to navigate the ups and downs of high school romance!

altTitles.ja: ひとりじめ～調教願望～

description.en: Masahiro's parents have remarried and he is supposed to live with them, and a honor student Rei, who is in the same class with Masahiro, thinks "that a guy who thinks nothing but sex shouldn't be allowed to live together." Her words enrage Masahiro and he began to distance himself from her and on that moment, an unexpected reaction from Rei…?
description.ja:
「私のカラダ　覚えてくれたんだ」

チャラ男の真弘が親の再婚で同居することになったのは、同じクラスの優等生女子・怜。“セックスしか頭にないような人とは暮らせない”何かと真弘に突っかかる怜の言葉に怒って、思わず彼女を押し倒した真弘。拒否されると思いきや、怜は意外な反応をして…？

altTitles.ja: 深潭回廊

description.en:
He was a teacher who knew his student was gay and still desired his body.
After running away from everything, he became a wanderer and took the name Mos-san.

Yanagida struggled with the pain of being in love with the same sex. 
He committed attempted rape on a student when he was a teacher, and ran away from there. 
Before he knew it he had become Mos, a pitiful demon who had thrown his past away, but had no choice but to keep on living. 
He thought he'd lost everything but a single boy reached out his hand to him.

Seven years have passed since the painful but passionate story of 'Smells Like Green Spirit.'

description.en: Jigoku no Senki is an erotically charged noir/action series written by Shiro Azuma and illustrated by Toshio Maeda that was originally serialized  in 1977 under the title "Taxi Driver" but underwent a title change (feel free to speculate as to why) for its 3 volume tankoubon release in 1981. The story is about a former police detective who works as a taxi driver in order to keep his daughter on life support. He isn’t just a taxi driver, though, but also an extremely efficient hitman and he has a personal score to settle...

However, Shuten-douji, on the other hand, is fond of Mashiro and has no intention of using her as food!? Is it wrong to like each other too much? Unconsciously flirting in their newlywed life!

description.en:
Lucia grew up not knowing she was a princess. But when her mother died, she entered the palace and had the chance to see her entire future in a dream. In her dream, when she reached 19 years old, she was auctioned off to the bidder who offered the highest dowry. Her life became miserable from then on. When she woke up from her dream, she was determined to reshape her future, realizing that she had plenty of time before the crucial turning point. Thus, she begins her journey to change her dark future.

description.es:
Lucía creció sin saber que era ser una princesa. Pero cuando su Madre murió, ella entró en el palacio y tuvo la oportunidad de ver todo su futuro en un sueño. En su sueño, cuando tenía 19 años, la subastaron al licitador que ofreció la dote más alta. Su vida se volvió miserable a partir de ese momento. Elle est la seizième princesse du royaume. Elle vit recluse et oubliée de tous. Un rêve va tout changer. Pour échapper à l’effroyable destin qui la guette, elle est prête à confier sa vie au plus terrible des lions.

---
Lucia, jeune fille de 16 ans et princesse du royaume, a vu son futur à travers un rêve étrange. Mais c'était un cauchemar bien réel d'un mariage qui continue de la hanter. Pour changer son atroce destin, elle se propose en mariage au Duc Hugo Taran, un coureur de jupon très célèbre. Cela pourra-t-il briser le destin funeste de Lucia? Ce choix la mènera-t-elle vers un destin totalement inattendu?

Para mudar seu destino terrível, ela sugere um contrato de casamento com o duque Hugo Taran, um mulherengo conhecido.

description.en:
When the powerless thirteenth prince became emperor, he gave his tutor, Yo Yohwa, poison. His reason being his death at the hands of his own master in countless previous lives. The poisoned Yo Yohwa then regresses to an earlier time together with the prince and is determined to get on his good side this time in order to escape. However, the prince already discovered the truth…

“This is crazy. You killed me in the previous lives, and you neglected me in another. Now you’re acting all nice. Are you trying to get away?”

After Sirone was abandoned in a stable, he was found by a family of hunters and raised in a loving home. 

Despite the hardships of the peasant life, he learned how to read from a young age and became obsessed with books, especially ones on the history of magic. One day, he has an unlikely encounter with a mage and learns how to enter the "spirit zone," the first step to learning how to use magic. 

Although they say only nobles can be mages, will Sirone be able to prove his infinite potential?

description.az: Bu twitter qısa hekayəsi məktəbdən kənarda oğlan kimi səhv saldığı orta məktəbli qızla onun sinif yoldaşı arasındakı sevgi hekayəsini təsvir edir. Nəhayət,qızlar rok musiqisindəki ortaq zövqləri üzərində birləşirlər.
description.en:
Fashionable and upbeat high schooler Aya falls head over heels for an employee at a local CD shop. He’s got an air of mystery about him, always dressed well, and has impeccable taste in music. Little does she know — this supposedly male employee is actually her female classmate Mitsuki!

Mitsuki generally keeps to herself, but since her seat is right next to Aya’s, she can't help but be extremely aware of the other’s crush. Revealing the truth is out of the question — but perhaps getting closer to Aya wouldn’t be so bad...

***Overwhelming winner in the Web category of the 2023 Tsugimanga Awards (by Kadokawa).***
description.fr:
Une histoire très appréciée sur Twitter sur fond de musique de Rock.

Aya, une populaire lycéenne tombe sous le charme du discret vendeur du magasin de musique qu'elle fréquente.

Retour en classe, elle raconte toute l'histoire à ses amies et comment elle a un faible pour ce garçon aux airs de prince charmant.

Ce qu'elle ne sait pas c'est que ce mystérieux vendeur n'est en fait que sa voisine de bureau , Mitsuki, qu'elle a confondu pour un jeune homme.

Comment leur relation va-t-elle évolué ? Arriveront elles à expliquer ce quiproquo ?
description.id:
Series Pendek Twitter yang menggambarkan cerita tentang Gyaru dan Teman Sekelasnya.
Gyaru yang suka musik rock dan sering mendatangi toko kaset jatuh cinta ke pekerja paruh waktu yang bekerja disitu, tapi sedikit dia tahu ternyata pekerjanya itu perempuan dan teman sekelasnya.
description.tr: Süslünün tekinin hoşlandığı çocuk aslında sınıftaki sessiz kız çıkıyor.
description.uk: Популярна серія коротких манґ у твіттері, в якій розповідається про історію кохання між ґяру та її однокласницею, яку вона помилково сприймає як хлопця поза школою, через їхню взаємну любов до рок-музики.
description.pt-br:
Uma Gyaru/Gal que não se parece tanto com suas amigas (Gyarus também) frequenta uma loja de CD's e se apaixona pelo funcionário(?) de meio período do local.
Mas mal sabe ela que o funcionário(?) na realidade é uma menina e é uma das suas colegas de classe.

description.en: That day, Ichita Yamada was working part-time as usual. When he opened the back door after finishing his part-time job, he found a blank space and a person who called himself God. It was by chance that he was chosen by God to go to another world. He was perplexed, but decided to live anyway. Thinking about how to survive in this other world using the skills he received from God, he tries his best to have a physical relationship with a beautiful woman in this other world.
description.ja: その日も山田一太はいつもと変わらずバイトをしていた。バイトが終わり裏口の扉を開けると、そこには真っ白な空間が広がっていて、神と名乗る者がいた。 一太は偶然神によって選ばれ、異世界に行くことになった。一太は戸惑いながらも、取り合えず生きていこうと決めた。 神からもらったスキルを使って如何にこの異世界を生き抜くか考えながら、一太はこの異世界にいる美女と肉体関係を持つために色々と頑張っていく。
description.es-la: Ese día, Ichita Yamada estaba trabajando medio tiempo como de costumbre. Cuando abrió la puerta trasera después de terminar su trabajo de medio tiempo, encontró un espacio en blanco y una persona que se hacía llamar Dios. Fue por casualidad que Dios lo eligió para ir a otro mundo. Estaba perplejo, pero decidió vivir de todos modos. Pensando en cómo sobrevivir en este otro mundo usando las habilidades que recibió de Dios, hace todo lo posible por tener una relación física con una mujer hermosa en este otro mundo.

description.en:
"We'll kill all vampires. Sharing our own fallen 『 blood 』 as a weapon...!!"

Arbitration Knights travel around the world to protect peace. Rinslet, a girl who has just become a regular knight, meets Yuri, a vampire girl with cool silver hair and crimson eyes. 
Rinslet learns that she is an abomination who kills her own kind by manipulating the power of 《 blood armor 》, which materializes blood into swords, bows and arrows. She becomes Yuri's kin in exchange for her life, and her goal is...?

A Yuri x Vampire x Dark Fantasy!
description.ja: 「私達は全ての吸血鬼を殺す。自らの堕ちた『血』を分け与え武器として…!!」――世界各国を巡り平和を守る調停騎士団。その正騎士になったばかりの少女・リンスレットが出会ったのは、涼やかな銀髪と深紅の瞳を持つ吸血鬼の少女・ユーリ。血液を剣や弓矢に具現化する《血装》の力を操って同族を殺す彼女に対し、忌むべき存在と知りながら想いを通じ合わせるリンスレット。命と引き換えにユーリの眷族となった彼女が目指すは…!?百合×吸血鬼×ダークファンタジ！！

description.en: A chain-smoking catgirl struggles with her cigarette addiction.
description.ja: マナーやモラルなんて関係ねえ！クズねこの送るヤニまみれでお下品な日常をご覧ください。一応、妹とか普通にかわいいキャラもでてくるから！単行本でしか見れない貴重な喫煙シーンとかたぶん描くんで、予約してくれたらありがてーにゃ(笑)

altTitles.ja: 怪異と乙女と神隠し

description.en: Mysterious incidents in a city, one after the other. A demonic being is challenged to resolve them. Sumireko, seemingly a plain store clerk, aspires to be a novelist and rocks an alluring body with some ardent admirers. Adashino, an admirer who looks like a boy, is a bookstore clerk. He's steeped in mystery however, at first, until the path of challenges is revealed that he and his sister must face in the city in order to win their ticket back home, outside this world. A story of modern mysteries and romantic aspirations begins.
description.ru: Ряд загадочных инцидентов начинают происходить в городе. И всё бы ничего если этот город не был домом для Сумиреко, красивой девушки с писательским стремлением. Какие же происшествия будут ждать Сумиреко и её коллегу по работе, Адашино, полного загадок парня, работающего в книжном?
description.pt-br: Uma série de acidentes misteriosos acontecem um atrás do outro na cidade. Um ser demoníaco está desafiando a todos que os resolvam. Sumireko, uma aparentemente caixa comum de loja, deseja ser uma escritora e possui um corpo voluptuoso com muitos admiradores ardentes. Adashino, um admirador que parece com um jovem garoto é o caixa de uma livraria. Ele está mergulhado em mistérios, e de repente, o caminho pra ele e sua irmã voltarem para casa (em outro mundo) aparece. Uma história moderna de romance e aspirações começa!

altTitles.ja: 公爵家の99番目の花嫁

description.en:
Grace lost her mother and became an orphan, she lived on the streets and was waiting for the day of her death, but she was taken in by an angelic girl, Penelope Erdonia. One day, a marriage proposal came for Penelope from the Duke of Pelton, who was none other than the head of the most powerful family at the time. However, there is a rumour that all the women who went to the Pelton estate to marry him either disappear or return with a strange mind. In order to protect the innocent Penelope, Grace decides to marry the Duke instead.

---
When the daughter of the Erdona barony is forced to marry the infamous Duke Noel Felton, her loyal servant Grace McClean saves the day… by posing as the duke’s 99th bride-to-be! She’s doing her best to impress her fiancé by making him treats, rescuing a child, and even befriending the imperial princess! All seems well, until one day, Grace stumbles upon the duke’s journal and learns about his master plan... Will Grace survive her marriage? And what does the duke have in store for the empire?

---

description.it:
Grace ha perso la madre ed è rimasta orfana, viveva per strada e passava il tempo in attesa che arrivasse la sua morte, ma un giorno venne aiutata e accolta da una ragazza, Penelope Erdonia. In seguito, arrivò una proposta di matrimonio per Penelope da parte del duca di Felton, ossia il capo della famiglia più potente dell'epoca. Tuttavia, si dice che tutte le donne che sono andate alla tenuta di Felton per sposarlo scompaiano o ne escano completamente pazze. Per proteggere l'innocente Penelope, Grace decide di sposare il Duca al suo posto...

description.ko:
어머니를 잃고 천애 고아가 된 그레이스.
죽을 날만 기다리며 길에서 생활하던 그레이스는
천사 같은 아가씨 페네로피 에르도냐에게 거둬진 후
그레이스 에르도냐가 되었다.

생명의 은인인 그녀와 의자매처럼 없이 지내던 어느 날,
페네로피에게 혼담이 들어온다.

다름 아닌 현시점 최고의 권력을 자랑하는 가문인 '펠튼 공작가'

그곳에 시집간 여자들은 모두 실종되거나
정신이 이상하게 변해 돌아온다는 괴담이 있다.

페네로피를 지키기 위해 그녀 대신 공작에게 시집갈 계획을 세우는 그레이스.

'제가 처음은 아니라고 들었는데 혹시 몇 번째인지 알 수 있을까요?'

'어디 보자... 아가씨가 99번째입니다.'

그레이스 에르도냐, 정신 바짝 차리자!

title.en: The Blood Princess and the Knight

description.en:
I, who was a sacred knight, was defeated and captured in a battle against the vampire clan.   

"Oh? Letting you die? In your dreams! Accept my embrace, and in the future, please take care of me, my lovely daughter~"   

The silver-haired Queen of the Vampire Clan lifted my chin and smiled cunningly, her sharp canines drawing closer to my neck…

Ryuusei, after losing his mother to cancer, is set to find out about his birth father and his destiny as the evil dragon’s heir, but he is not the only one.

Третья часть саги Саруватари Тэцуи во вселенной "Жесткого". Что произошло после окончания второй части? Куда подевались некоторые старые герои? Где Киичи?

title.en: I Became a Top Actor Just by Reading Books!

altTitles.vi: Trở thành diễn viên hàng đầu nhờ vào việc đọc sách

description.en:
Due to his lack of talent, Seonghyeon gave up acting and became a writer. Seonghyeon is a genius author with a natural talent for screenplays, but he still misses acting. Then one day, he got into a truck accident on set.

“If I’m born again, I have to act,” he promised and closed his eyes.

Seonghyeon returns 13 years back into the past to when he was 24 years old. And the method acting ability that goes into his scripts became the character itself! Okay, this life is about being reborn as a genius actor!

altTitles.ja: 雨と君と

description.en: On a rainy summer evening, a woman and a "dog" happened to meet each other and life has never been the same since.
description.ja: 雨の降る日に、１人と１匹は出会いました。“あともうちょっと”がほっこり尊いと話題です。
description.ru: В один дождливый день она подобрала что-то похожее на собаку... Давайте же посмотрим, насколько хитрой может быть эта "собака"...
description.pt-br: Em uma noite chuvosa de verão, uma mulher e um "cachorro" se conheceram e a vida nunca mais foi a mesma desde então.

title.en: The Girl with the Sanpaku Eyes

altTitles.ja: 三白眼ちゃんは伝えたい

altTitles.en: The Feelings of a Girl with Sanpaku Eyes

description.en:
This is a retelling of how Amane and Katou met, from The Story of a Girl with Sanpaku Eyes.  
  
Trivia: Sanpaku (三白) is a Japanese term meaning "three whites". It is generally referred to in English as "sanpaku eyes" and refers to eyes in which the white space above or below the iris is visible.
description.vi: Xin giới thiệu Mizuno Amane, một cô nàng với cặp mắt tam bạch (sanpuku) dữ tợn và trái tim thiếu nữ dịu dàng! Amane đã phải lòng anh chàng bàn bên Katou mất rồi! Rồi bây giờ sẽ phải làm sao để bày tỏ nỗi lòng với chàng trai ấy đây?!

altTitles.ja: 植物モンスター娘日記　～聖女だった私が裏切られた果てにアルラウネに転生してしまったので、これからは光合成をしながら静かに植物ライフを過ごします～

altTitles.en: Plant Monster Girl Diary ~I was a saint, but I was betrayed and reincarnated into Alraune, so from now on I will spend my plant life quietly while photosynthesizing~

description.en:
Who knew that even a stationary plant could be surprisingly capable?!

Our protagonist is a saint—or was, until she was betrayed by one of her fellow saint apprentices as well as her fiancé, a hero. 
In her final moments, she recalls her previous life, when she was just a normal Japanese high school girl, but that doesn't help the fact that she's being eaten alive by a massive plant monster.

And yet, by a stroke of luck, she doesn't die for good, but instead reincarnates as said plant monster. With the upper half of a human and the lower half of a plant, she must now spend her life as an Alraune.

And so, she tries to live the peaceful life of a plant, photosynthesizing all day!
Welcome to the diary of a plant girl who just wants some peace and quiet, but something always gets in her way!

[web novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n4444ge/) (jp)

---
description.ja:
植物なので動けないんですが、意外となんとかなります!?
魔王討伐の旅の途中、後輩の聖女見習いと婚約者だった勇者に裏切られ、殺されてしまった聖女。
死の間際、日本の女子高生だった前世を思いだすが、役には立たず花のモンスターに食べられることに。
気がつけば、女子高生＆聖女の記憶を持ったまま、上半身は人、下半身は植物のモンスター・アルラウネに転生していた。
よし、だったら光合成しながら静かに暮らそう！
平穏無事な日々を望むもそうはいかないモンスター娘の徒然日記。

One day, Takase's beloved cat Mi-chan transforms into a human! Can Mi-chan make Takase, who loves cats but has no interest in human girls, fall in love with her?

description.ja:
猫!? それとも人!?

ある日、高瀬くんが愛でていた猫のみーちゃんが人間に大変身!
なんと、みーちゃんは人間に変身できる猫だった!
猫は大好きだけど、人間には素っ気ない高瀬くんをみーちゃんは振り向かせることができるのか!?

猫大好き&人間キョーミなしの高瀬くんと、人間に変身できる猫のみーちゃんの、猫まみれラブコメ!
